caption.p: Projected contributions of SLR and TC climatology change to changes in the 100-year flood level. a Changes in η 100 year for the future period of 2070–2095 due to SLR (Δ η 100 year, SLR). b Changes in η 100 year for the future period of 2070–2095 due to TC climatology change (Δ η 100 year, TC). c Relative contributions of SLR and TC climatology change to the projected changes in η 100 year. Source data are provided as a Source data file
